'''Bedrock Editor v1.1.1''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on September 3, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/259|title=Release 1.1.1 (1.21.120.20)|website=GitHub|date=September 3, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/39262266489613-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-120-20|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.120.20|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=September 3, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added confirmation dialog in Keyboard Settings when resetting, restoring or closing the modal without saved changes.
* Added gradient background color on the Color timeline that interpolates between the colors of two adjacent nodes.
* Added optional boolean property in Timeline API ({{cd|renderGradientBackground}}) that allows the rendering of the background color to be turned off. By default it is ON.

== Changes ==
* Removed unusable entities from Summon tool list.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug that caused lightning bolts to not despawn when entities are paused.
* Fixed a bug that caused text to speech narration to read shortcuts incorrectly.
* Fixed a bug that enables to select volumes using {{keys|Enter}} key and {{keys|Shift+Enter}} key while in Selection's Freehand Brush Mode.
